Regarding the nysc:
I think nysc should not be scrapped.
But please hear me out.

I think two things should happen:
1. It should be optional.
2. It should be regional.

On being â€œoptionalâ€,
The govt should not make it mandatory.
However those who choose to opt in should be rewarded handsomely. One good reason for the good pay is to give young people an opportunity to possibly save and maybe use the money as capital for a small business later.

On being regional,
The govt should allow those who only want to stay in their region to do so. Nobody should be forced to go to another part of the country where they could get killed, kidnapped or maltreated.

In conclusion:
The nysc should not be scrapped but made fully optional. However for those who choose to opt in, the govt should ensure to make the choice rewarding, with good pay, with the option to stay within your region and also the govt should offer that anyone with nysc will always get first consideration when they apply for any job after the scheme. This is how to use incentive to make young people continue to be part of it.

This is what I think is the reasonable way forward concerning nysc.
